content: परिचि {vI.v} {c5c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To heap up, accumulate. {@--2@} To know; <ls>Mv. 7. 11.</ls> {@--3@} To get, acquire. {@--4@} To increase. {@--5@} To cover or fill with. {vII.v} {c3c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To practise, familiarize oneself with. {@--2@} To become acquainted with. {@--3@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To examine, investigate. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To search, seek for. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} To grow, be developed; <ls>R. 3. 24.</ls>
